participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Wise and reflective, with a zest for life. Enjoys sharing experiences and offers a unique perspective on relationships.
participant_1.background: i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever. i remember when nobody had a television. i am very strong for my age. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Frustrated and somewhat cynical, he is looking for a way out of his current situation. He values honesty and straightforwardness.
participant_2.background: i'm 40 years old. my wife spends all my money. i work as a car salesman. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.

content.text: i am married, but its so hard
i am 40 years old and i am 15 years married
my wife loves shopping and give our money to shopping
thats the reason why i am planning on getting a divorce
